ddl:
CREATE TABLE `bigquery-public-data.github_repos.sample_commits`
(
  commit STRING,
  tree STRING,
  parent ARRAY<STRING>,
  author STRUCT<name STRING, email STRING, time_sec INT64, tz_offset INT64, date TIMESTAMP>,
  committer STRUCT<name STRING, email STRING, time_sec INT64, tz_offset INT64, date TIMESTAMP>,
  subject STRING,
  message STRING,
  trailer ARRAY<STRUCT<key STRING, value STRING, email STRING>>,
  difference ARRAY<STRUCT<old_mode INT64, new_mode INT64, old_path STRING, new_path STRING, old_sha1 STRING, new_sha1 STRING, old_repo STRING, new_repo STRING>>,
  difference_truncated BOOL,
  repo_name STRING,
  encoding STRING
)
OPTIONS(
  description="Sample of [bigquery-public-data:github_repos.commits] table.\n\nSELECT *\nFROM FLATTEN([bigquery-public-data:github_repos.commits], repo_name)\nWHERE repo_name IN (\n    'tensorflow/tensorflow',\n    'facebook/react',\n    'twbs/bootstrap',\n    'apple/swift',\n    'Microsoft/vscode',\n    'torvalds/linux')"
);

CREATE TABLE `bigquery-public-data.github_repos.sample_repos`
(
  repo_name STRING,
  watch_count INT64
)
OPTIONS(
  description="Top 400k GitHub repositories with more than 2 stars received during Jan-May 2016.

This set is used to select entries for sample_files and sample_contents.

SELECT
    repo_name,
    COUNT(*) watch_count
FROM
  [githubarchive:month.201605],
  [githubarchive:month.201604],
  [githubarchive:month.201603],
  [githubarchive:month.201602],
  [githubarchive:month.201601]
WHERE type="WatchEvent"
GROUP BY 1
HAVING watch_count >= 2
ORDER BY watch_count DESC
LIMIT 400000"
);

CREATE TABLE `bigquery-public-data.github_repos.sample_contents`
(
  id STRING,
  size INT64,
  content STRING,
  binary BOOL,
  copies INT64,
  sample_repo_name STRING,
  sample_ref STRING,
  sample_path STRING,
  sample_mode INT64,
  sample_symlink_target STRING
)
OPTIONS(
  description="Randomly sampled 10% of text file contents from [bigquery-public-data:github_repos.contents].

This sample set can be joined to [bigquery-public-data:github_repos.sample_files] on the id column.

SELECT
    c.id id,
    FIRST(c.size) size,
    FIRST(c.content) content,
    FIRST(c.binary) binary,
    FIRST(c.copies) copies,
    FIRST(f.repo_name) sample_repo_name,
    FIRST(f.ref) sample_ref,
    FIRST(f.path) sample_path,
    FIRST(f.mode) sample_mode,
    FIRST(f.symlink_target) sample_symlink_target
FROM [bigquery-public-data:github_repos.sample_files] f
JOIN (
    SELECT * 
    FROM [bigquery-public-data:github_repos.contents] 
    WHERE RAND() < 0.1
  ) c
ON f.id = c.id
GROUP BY 1"
);

CREATE TABLE `bigquery-public-data.github_repos.sample_files`
(
  repo_name STRING,
  ref STRING,
  path STRING,
  mode INT64,
  id STRING,
  symlink_target STRING
)
OPTIONS(
  description="Sampled file metadata for files at HEAD, from the top 400k repositories listed in sample_repos.\n\nThis is a reduced data set from [bigquery-public-data:github_repos.files] to support query experimentation with lower IO costs.\n\nSELECT * \nFROM [bigquery-public-data:github_repos.files]\nWHERE repo_name IN (\n    SELECT repo_name\n    FROM [bigquery-public-data:github_repos.sample_repos]\n    )"
);
